data.title: J.D. Hayworth on LinkedIn: Border flap turns Senate into sewage center
data.meta_description:
JD-in-Print:  A "Sinematic Flop!"
Capitol Hill's latest casting call brought an increasingly out-of-touch, aging GOP Leader together with a fading Arizona‚Ä¶ | 12 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
@#JUSTICEFORCE United States Senate United States Attorneys' Offices Supreme Court of the U.S. To all who allow and do not impeach you too should be charged for aiding and abetting, 2nd degree murder and these U.S.Code violations and should be jailed as the proof is irrefutable. 18 U.S. Code ¬ß 2384. Seditious conspiracy ‚Äì ‚Äú or delay the execution of any law of the United States‚Äù 18 U.S.C. ¬ß 241,‚Äúto injure, oppress, threaten, or intimidate any person ... in the free exercise or enjoyment of any right or privilege secured to him by the Constitution‚Äù 18 U.S. Code ¬ß 242 - Deprivation of rights under color of law 18 U.S. Code ¬ß 371 - Conspiracy to commit offense or to defraud United States 5 U.S. Code ¬ß 3331 - Oath of office 18 U.S. Code ¬ß 1505. Obstruction of criminal investigations Not sure if any of you believe in God almighty but if you do, you should pray that Lloyd Goodnow is not appointed as he will without bias enforce the law, U.S. codes and Constitution to all including judges, lawyers, media personnel,bureaucrats, politicians, philanthropists, organizers of groups and those who subvert the Constitution and The Rule of Law.

#Safety is a fundamental human need, and thus the right of self defense became enshrined in every legal system. However, European people, and especially ruling aristocracies, just got fed up with armed militias and civil wars, and personal arms were banned. The #socialcontract came to include, alongside other civil safeguards - freedom and liberty, limited political power, representation, safety nets, an independent judiciary - expectations of public safety. Fast forward, some parts of Europe, including in metropolitan cities, are no longer safe. Especially for the most vulnerable of our society. And from time to time they become lawless wastelands. They resemble little of the free, tolerant, diverse, kind, cosmopolitan Europe we envision and desire. This, of course, is a tragedy of the commons, a failure of irresponsible policy, undermining the very principles of a safe, shared, liberal society.

The ICJ just shows how broken the international court and the UN are, they stop fulfilling their role as peacekeepers and international and human rights protectors long time ago, by getting short to call for the complete cease fire in Gaza and to protect human lives. Is a reality we all live these days that no organization can protect society against the powerful and rich countries around the world. Everything is a sham a false, the best proof is the Presiding judge is there to look for the US and UK interest not to serve and interpret the law, she is and American judge place there by US and is subservient to US, she is bias and in the pocket of US and UK. They don't have any shame or honor ...If I was a Head of state of any country I walk away for that Circus and focus to run my country without any external interventions, because is no such thing of international law, the law if for some and not to others and that is not law. Remember Law and Justice are two different things. U.S. President George Bush signed into law the American Servicemembers Protection Act of 2002, which is intended to intimidate countries that ratify the treaty for the International Criminal Court (ICC). The new law authorizes the use of military force to liberate any American or citizen of a U.S.-allied country being held by the court, which is located in The Hague. In addition, the law provides for the withdrawal of U.S. military assistance from countries ratifying the ICC treaty and restricts U.S. participation in United Nations peacekeeping unless the United States obtains immunity from prosecution. At the same time, these provisions can be waived by the president on "national interest" grounds. Know what moral grounds America and allies have to complain about South Africa for calling Israel a genocidal state, when most his allies and itself are historically committing genocide and atrocities against humanity for decades and some even centuries. America. Germany, France, UK, Italy, etc. are the corrupt power elite that are calling the shots, and the international order is had been demolished by the Powerful and Neo-colonialist countries driven by their greed and control. "The states that have ratified this treaty are trying to strengthen the rule of law,"
